subject: Steroids

Vegan
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: The People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals mailed Roger Clemens vegan treats after he said he did not know what a vegan was during Wednesday’s Congressional hearing.
snippet: The People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals mailed Roger Clemens vegan treats after he said he did not know what a vegan was during Wednesday’s Congressional hearing.
